sentence.Network_en: Trendy teachers are denying children the opportunity to study classic texts.
sentence.Network_cn: 赶时髦的教师正在剥夺孩子学习经典课本的机会。

sentence.Network_en: Opposition leaders are denying any contact with the government in Kabul.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对派领袖否认与喀布尔政府有任何联系。

sentence.Network_en: He has issued a short, cryptic statement denying the spying charges.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发表了一个简短隐晦的声明，否认对其间谍行为的指控。

entry.def: When you deny something, you state that it is not true.

example.tran: 她对两项指控均予以否认。

example.ex: The government has denied that there was a plot to assassinate the president...
example.tran: 政府否认曾有人密谋暗杀总统。

entry.tran: 否认与…有关系;否认…是自己的;不承认;抛弃
entry.def: If you deny someone or something, you say that they have no connection with you or do not belong to you.

example.ex: I denied my father because I wanted to become someone else.
example.tran: 我和父亲断绝了关系，因为我想成为一个不一样的自己。

entry.def: If you deny someone something that they need or want, you refuse to let them have it.

example.ex: If he is unlucky, he may find that his ex-partner denies him access to his children...
example.tran: 如果不走运的话，他可能会发现前妻拒绝让他接近自己的孩子。
